entry.string: Database connection to database #(1) failed. Either the information supplied was erroneous, such as a bad or missing password, or there is no database available. If you cannot create a database notify your system administrator.
entry.translation: Detebese-a cunnecshun tu detebese-a #(1) feeeled. Bork bork bork! Ieezeer zee inffurmeshun sooppleeed ves irruneuoos, sooch es a bed oor meessing pessvurd, oor zeere-a is nu detebese-a efeeeleble-a. Iff yuoo cunnut creete-a a detebese-a nuteeffy yuoor system edmeenistretur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Could not create database (#(1)). Check if you already have a database by that name and remove it.
entry.translation: Cuoold nut creete-a detebese-a (#(1)). Check iff yuoo elreedy hefe-a a detebese-a by thet neme-a und remufe-a it. Um de hur de hur de hur.
Gruoop 'lefft' nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Xaraya cannot install bcause the following core modules are missing or corrupted: #(1)
entry.translation: Xereya cunnut instell becoose-a zee fullooeeng cure-a mudooles ere-a meessing oor curroopted: #(1)

entry.string: There are currently no configuration files available.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a coorrently nu cunffeegooreshun feeles efeeeleble-a.

entry.string: Please go back and select one of the available configurations.
entry.translation: Pleese-a gu beck und select oone-a ooff zee efeeeleble-a cunffeegooreshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: A container privilege for denying access to certain roles
entry.translation: A cunteeener preefilege-a fur denyeeng eccess tu certeeen rules

entry.string: Cannot load because of unsatisfied dependencies. One or more of the following modules is missing:
entry.translation: Cunnut lued becoose-a ooff unseteesffied dependenceees. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Oone-a oor mure-a ooff zee fullooeeng mudooles is meessing:

entry.string: Please check the listings at www.xaraya.com to identify any modules flagged as 'Unknown'.
entry.translation: Pleese-a check zee leestings et vvv.xereya.cum tu identeeffy uny mudooles flegged es 'Oonknoon'.

entry.string: Add the missing module(s) to the modules directory and run the installer again.
entry.translation: Edd zee meessing mudoole-a(s) tu zee mudooles durectury und roon zee insteller egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Cannot log in the default administrator. Check your setup.
entry.translation: Cunnut lug in zee deffoolt edmeenistretur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Check yuoor setoop.
Gruoop 'reeght' nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!
Gruoop 'heeder' nut fuoond. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Registered users have read access to all modules of the site.
entry.translation: Regeestered users hefe-a reed eccess tu ell mudooles ooff zee seete-a.

entry.string: Unregistered users have read access to the non-core modules of the site. If this option is not chosen unregistered users see only the first page.
entry.translation: Unregeestered users hefe-a reed eccess tu zee nun-cure-a mudooles ooff zee seete-a. Iff thees oopshun is nut chusee unregeestered users see-a oonly zee furst pege-a.
